json_config_file.Description: Retrieve the provider configuration from this JSON file

logging.Description: Logging options for the API connection

port.Description: If the port is non-standard for the protocol, the port number to use

timeout.Description: The timeout in seconds for all communications with Prisma Cloud

url.Description: The API URL without the leading protocol

delay_notification_ms.Description: Delay notifications by the specified milliseconds

enabled.Description: Enabled

excluded_policies.Description: List of policies to exclude from scan

notification_config.Description: List of data for notifications to third-party tools

enabled.Description: Scan enabled

last_sent_ts.Description: Time of last notification in milliseconds

recipients.Description: List of unique email addresses to notify

policies.Description: List of specific policies to scan

values.Description: List of values for resource tag key

enabled.Description: Whether or not the account is enabled

group_ids.Description: List of account IDs to which you are assigning this account

name.Description: Name to be used for the account on the Prisma Cloud platform (must be unique)

ram_arn.Description: Unique identifier for an Alibaba RAM role resource

integration_config.Description: Integration configuration, the values depend on the integration type

account_id.Description: AWS/Azure account ID for AWS Security Hub/Azure Service Bus Queue integration

auth_token.Description: PagerDuty/Splunk authentication token for the event collector

base_url.Description: Qualys Security Operations Center server API URL (without "http(s)")

connection_string.Description: Connection string for azure service bus queue integration

external_id.Description: AWS external ID for Amazon S3 integration

org_id.Description: GCP Organization ID for Google CSCC integration

queue_url.Description: The Queue URL you used when you configured Prisma Cloud in Amazon SQS or Azure Service Bus Queue

region.Description: AWS region for Amazon S3 integration

regions.Description: AWS regions for AWS Security Hub integration

role_arn.Description: AWS role ARN for Amazon S3 integration

roll_up_interval.Description: File Roll Up Time in minutes for AWS S3 integration and snowflake Integration

s3_uri.Description: AWS S3 URI for Amazon S3 integration

source_id.Description: GCP Source ID for Google CSCC integration

staging_integration_id.Description: Amazon S3 Id for snowflake integration

tables.Description: Key/value pairs that identify the ServiceNow module tables with which to integrate (e.g. - incident, sn_si_incident, or em_event)

url.Description: Webhook URL or Splunk HTTP event collector URL

reason.Description: Model for the integration status details

enabled.Description: Whether or not the account is enabled

group_ids.Description: List of account IDs to which you are assigning this account

member_external_id.Description: AWS Member account role's external ID

member_role_status.Description:
true = The member role created using stack set exists in all the member accounts. All the Org accounts will be added.
false = Only the master account will be added.

enabled.Description: Whether or not the account is enabled

group_ids.Description: List of account IDs to which you are assigning this account

hierarchy_selection.Description: List of hierarchy selection. Each item has resource id, display name, node type and selection type

display_name.Description: Display name for folder, project, or organization

node_type.Description: Node type. Valid values - FOLDER, PROJECT, ORG

resource_id.Description: Resource ID. For folders, format is folders/{folder ID}. For projects, format is {project number}. For orgs, format is organizations/{org ID}

selection_type.Description: Selection type. Valid values: INCLUDE, EXCLUDE, ALL. If hierarchySelection.nodeType is PROJECT or FOLDER, then a valid value is either INCLUDE or EXCLUDE

name.Description: Name to be used for the account on the Prisma Cloud platform (must be unique)

protection_mode.Description: Protection Mode - Monitor or Monitor and Protect

default_account_group_id.Description: Account group id for this account

enabled.Description: Whether or not the account is enabled

group_name.Description: OCI identity group name that you define. Can be an existing group

name.Description: Name to be used for the account on the Prisma Cloud platform (must be unique)

policy_name.Description: OCI identity policy name that you define. Can be an existing policy that has the right policy statements

user_name.Description: OCI identity user name that you define. Can be an existing user that has the right privileges

user_ocid.Description: OCI identity user Ocid that you define. Can be an existing user that has the right privileges

compliance_metadata.Description: List of compliance data. Each item has compliance standard, requirement, and/or section information

enabled.Description: Enabled

criteria.Description: Saved search ID that defines the rule criteria

classification_result.Description: Data Profile name required for DLP rule criteria

rule_type.Description: Type of rule or RQL query

system_default.Description: If policy is a system default policy or not

cloud_type.Description: Cloud type (Required parameter for Compliance report and Cloud Security Assessment report)

compression_enabled.Description: Business unit detailed report compression enabled

notify_to.Description: List of email addresses to receive notification

schedule.Description: Recurring report schedule in RRULE format

to_now.Description: From some time in the past to now

is_wild_card_dest_cloud_resource_name.Description: Is destination cloud resource name a wildcard

saved.Description: Set to true when the saved search is created
